Uses of Package
edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151

  • Classes in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151 used by edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151 
    Class and Description
    Board
    Board provides the Grid for the simulation.
    BoardObject
    BoardObject determines the type of object placed in the Board and notifies the Board object.
    BoardObjectType
    BoardObjectType responsible for keeping track of surroundings of an object and notifying the Board object.
    BoardPosition
    BoardPosition keeps track and informs of row and column information per object placed on the Board.
    Game
    Game will: Configure the board Configure ghosts Configure the target Update the game Render the game Run the number of ghosts Print statistics at conclusion of game
    Ghost
    Ghost will communicate with other Ghosts to acquire a target and be aware of areas already visited by each other.
